page.title: 09EMPLOYMENT
page.content: SURVEY OF PUPILS' PARENTS LETHAM P.S. Unemployment is low in the village 6% Less people than one would expect are involved in agriculture 4%. Most people work in the Construction Industry 24% or Services 24% followed by Engineering 16%. 10% are employed in Health Care while 6% are in Education.Local Government, Police, Fire Service account for 5% while Electronics, Finance and Research add up to a further 5%. Only 38% work in the village the remaining 62% have to travel to work _ 17% to Forfar,and 17% to Dundee while 1% travel to Perth 38 miles away daily.The remainder travel daily to other towns within easy reach.8% work in Aberdeen,elsewhere in Britain or abroad only coming home when possible.
